Product Title: Tangled
Review Date: 2019/12/20
Store: Mandy Moore  (Actor),     Zachary Levi  (Actor),     Nathan Greno  (Director),     Byron Howard  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
Product Description: ['Disney presents a new twist on one of the most hilarious and hair-raising tales ever told. Your whole family will get tangled up in the fun, excitement and adventure of this magical motion picture.When the kingdom\'s most wanted - and most charming - bandit Flynn Rider hides in a mysterious tower, the last thing he expects to find is Rapunzel, a spirited teen with an unlikely superpower - 70 feet of magical golden hair! Together, the unlikely duo sets off on a fantastic journey filled with surprising heroes, laughter and suspense.Let your hair down and get ready to cheer for "Tangled." Bursting with never-before-seen bonus features, it\'s even more enchanting on Blu-ray Hi-Def.']
Average Rating: 4.8

Tangled
Mandy Moore  (Actor),     Zachary Levi  (Actor),     Nathan Greno  (Director),     Byron Howard  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
['Disney presents a new twist on one of the most hilarious and hair-raising tales ever told. Your whole family will get tangled up in the fun, excitement and adventure of this magical motion picture.When the kingdom\'s most wanted - and most charming - bandit Flynn Rider hides in a mysterious tower, the last thing he expects to find is Rapunzel, a spirited teen with an unlikely superpower - 70 feet of magical golden hair! Together, the unlikely duo sets off on a fantastic journey filled with surprising heroes, laughter and suspense.Let your hair down and get ready to cheer for "Tangled." Bursting with never-before-seen bonus features, it\'s even more enchanting on Blu-ray Hi-Def.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary Updated:**

- **Preferred Genres:** Comedy, Drama, Romance, Animation  
- **Mood:** Cheerful, Passionate  
- **Content Interests:** Enjoys light-hearted narratives with emotional and relational themes, particularly valuing romantic elements and heartfelt stories. Recently, the user has shown enthusiasm for animated films that blend humor with adventure.  
- **Viewing Habits:** Prefers romantic comedies and romantic dramas, with a growing appreciation for animated films that deliver both entertainment and emotional depth. The user actively rates films and expresses strong enjoyment for family-friendly narratives.  
- **Formats:** Favors digital access for convenience (e.g., Kindle and streaming services) but also appreciates physical formats when they enhance the viewing experience, such as DVDs.  
- **Engagement Style:** Exhibits significant enthusiasm for films, sharing joys of favorites with high ratings, and a tendency to express approval for engaging storytelling and character dynamics; recently provided a perfect rating for an animated film.  
- **Key Features Valued:** High-quality storytelling, engaging character dynamics, and relatable life situations that evoke laughter and warmth are emphasized.  
- **Purchase Behavior:** Willing to invest in emotionally engaging films, consistently giving high ratings to preferred titles while maintaining a nuanced approach to adaptations and variations in storytelling across formats.  

Overall, the user reflects a continued love for entertaining, feel-good stories that inspire positive reviews, alongside a broader appreciation for animation that resonates with their preferences.
